34#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
35#include "config.h"
36#endif
37
38#include <sys/types.h>
39#include <sys/param.h>
40
41#include <string.h>
42#include PATH_IPSEC_H
43
44#include "ipsec_strerror.h"
45
46int __ipsec_errcode;
47
48static const char *ipsec_errlist[] = {
49"Success", /*EIPSEC_NO_ERROR*/
50"Not supported", /*EIPSEC_NOT_SUPPORTED*/
51"Invalid argument", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_ARGUMENT*/
52"Invalid sadb message", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_SADBMSG*/
53"Invalid version", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_VERSION*/
54"Invalid security policy", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_POLICY*/
55"Invalid address specification", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_ADDRESS*/
56"Invalid ipsec protocol", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_PROTO*/
57"Invalid ipsec mode", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_MODE*/
58"Invalid ipsec level", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_LEVEL*/
59"Invalid SA type", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_SATYPE*/
60"Invalid message type", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_MSGTYPE*/
61"Invalid extension type", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_EXTTYPE*/
62"Invalid algorithm type", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_ALGS*/
63"Invalid key length", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_KEYLEN*/
64"Invalid address family", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_FAMILY*/
65"Invalid prefix length", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_PREFIXLEN*/
66"Invalid direction", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_DIR*/
67"SPI range violation", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_SPI*/
68"No protocol specified", /*EIPSEC_NO_PROTO*/
69"No algorithm specified", /*EIPSEC_NO_ALGS*/
70"No buffers available", /*EIPSEC_NO_BUFS*/
71"Must get supported algorithms list first", /*EIPSEC_DO_GET_SUPP_LIST*/
72"Protocol mismatch", /*EIPSEC_PROTO_MISMATCH*/
73"Family mismatch", /*EIPSEC_FAMILY_MISMATCH*/
74"Too few arguments", /*EIPSEC_FEW_ARGUMENTS*/
75NULL, /*EIPSEC_SYSTEM_ERROR*/
76"Priority offset not in valid range [-2147483647, 2147483648]", /*EIPSEC_INVAL_PRIORITY_OFFSET*/
77"Priority offset from base not in valid range [0, 1073741823] for negative offsets and [0, 1073741824] for positive offsets", /* EIPSEC_INVAL_PRIORITY_OFFSET */
78"Policy priority not compiled in", /*EIPSEC_PRIORITY_NOT_COMPILED*/
79"Unknown error", /*EIPSEC_MAX*/
80};
81
82const char *ipsec_strerror(void)
83{
84 if (__ipsec_errcode < 0 || __ipsec_errcode > EIPSEC_MAX)
85 __ipsec_errcode = EIPSEC_MAX;
86
87 return ipsec_errlist[__ipsec_errcode];
88}
89
90void __ipsec_set_strerror(const char *str)
91{
92 __ipsec_errcode = EIPSEC_SYSTEM_ERROR;
93 ipsec_errlist[EIPSEC_SYSTEM_ERROR] = str;
94
95 return;
96}
97
